articles.title: NASA Pays Rich Homage To Apollo 11 Astronaut Michael Collins - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Michael Collins, the third American astronaut on the Apollo 11 mission to the Moon along with Buzz Aldrin and Neil Armstrong, passed away on Wednesday, and was paid tribute to by NASA.
articles.content: NASA on Thursday paid a rich tribute to Michael Collins, the American astronaut who was the command module pilot for the Apollo 11 mission to the moon. Collins, 90, passed away on Wednesday after bat… [+2923 chars]

articles.title: Joe Biden unveils plan to reverse Donald Trump's tax cuts for rich - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Biden will use his speech to a joint session of Congress to unveil the $1.8 trillion American Families Plan, funded by ending Trump's tax cuts and closing loopholes used by the most wealthy to escape paying their share, officials said.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Brazil says Russian COVID-19 vaccine carried live cold virus - CNA
articles.description: Tainted batches of Russia's Sputnik V Covid vaccine sent to Brazil carried a live version of a common cold-causing virus, the South American country's health regulator reported in a presentation explaining its decision to ban the drug's import.
articles.content: WASHINGTON: Tainted batches of Russia's Sputnik V COVID-19 vaccine sent to Brazil carried a live version of a common cold-causing virus, the South American country's health regulator reported in a pr… [+3068 chars]

articles.title: Michael Collins, the ‘forgotten’ astronaut of Apollo 11, dies at 90 - Daily Maverick
articles.description: April 28 (Reuters) - American astronaut Michael Collins, who as pilot of the Apollo 11 command module stayed behind on July 20, 1969, while Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin traveled to the lunar surface to become the first humans to walk on the moon, died on We…
articles.content:
By Rosalba O’Brien
A statement released by his family said Collins died of cancer.
